analyzed: garbha saṅgrahaḥ
namaḥ mahā kāruṇikāya
trailokya duḥkha sindhūnām karmabhyaḥ kṣubdha vīcayaḥ
kuśala akuśala ādibhyaḥ sa āsravebhyaḥ viniḥsṛtāḥ
rāga dveṣāt itas tāni jātāni kleśa hetutaḥ
teṣām udbhava hetuḥ ca api iṣṭa aniṣṭa ādikaḥ tathā
dvaidha grahaṇataḥ jātaḥ padārtha grāhaka grahāḥ
nitya vibhu aikata ādyāḥ ca samasta utpāda hetavaḥ
bhāgyavān puruṣaḥ tasmāt mukti kāṃkṣī para ātmanoḥ
prati iti ādi su yuktīnām abhyāsaiḥ vinivārayet
bhāvānām grahaṇam tāvat dharmān bāhya antara akhilān
sarva lakṣaṇa hīnena ca ākāśena samam bhajet
vastu graha abhibhūtam tu lakṣyīkṛtya akhilam jagat
duḥkha sāgara saṃśoṣi mahā kāruṇya pūrvakam
sva para artha bhavam ratnam bodhi cittam prabhāvayet
bodhi caryā mahāvīci ṣaṣ pāramitā ādikam
dhyāna vyutthāna yogena pañca mārgaiḥ kramāt vrajet

original: dvividhāvaraṇaṃ chittvā dvau saṃbhārau prapūrya ca // Gs_8 //
analyzed: dvividha āvaraṇam chittvā dvau saṃbhārau prapūrya ca
tri kāya phalam āptavyam tri kāya āpteḥ ca lakṣaṇam
nabhaḥ vat śūnya tāyāḥ ca an ābhoga karuṇā ambudāt
bodhimaṇḍa su bījebhyaḥ puṇya śasyāni pācayet
hṛdayam sarva buddhānām garbha saṅgrahaḥ iti ayam
kāla antyāt alpam āyuṣyam bahu rogāḥ ca alpa bhogi tā
durhetu bahu vighnaiḥ ca ciram sthātum aśaktitaḥ
pada anuccheda śakya tvāt sat mitram hi samāśrayet
atyanta vīrya cittena prapātam smaratā bhṛśam

original: saṅgṛhīto 'ñjasā garbho moktuṃ svaṃ ca paraṃ tathā // Gs_13 //
analyzed: saṅgṛhītaḥ ñjasā garbhaḥ moktum svam ca param tathā
sneha enā etad kṛtāt puṇyāt sattvāḥ sarve durbhagāḥ

original: bodhicittamayā bhūtvā garbhaṃ gṛhṇantu cāñjasā // Gs_14 //
analyzed: bodhi citta mayāḥ bhūtvā garbham gṛhṇantu ca añjasā
garbhasaṅgrahaḥ nāma mahā ācārya dīpaṅkara śrī jñāna viracitaḥ samāptaḥ
